name: This Week In Gaming, A News Show By Gamers, For Gamers!
blurb: This Week In Gaming is a Video Game News Show by a gamer for gamers. Every week a show will be released and be 40-1 hour long.

rewards.reward: A $1 pledge will grant you a thank you letter from the team!
A $5 pledge will grant you a thank you letter from the team and a Bronze spot on our contributors list that will be given a shout out each week during This Week In Gaming!

A $15 pledge will grant you a thank you letter from the team and a Bronze spot on our contributors list that will be given a shout out each week during This Week In Gaming! You will also be granted a special "Contributor" forum title on http://www.lugoentertainment.com!

A $25 pledge will grant you a thank you letter from the team and a Bronze spot on our contributors list that will be given a shout out each week during This Week In Gaming! You will also be granted a special "Contributor" forum title on http://www.lugoentertainment.com as well as your name in the This Week In Gaming "By Gamers, For Gamers." intro! Also you will get a This Week In Gaming T-Shirt!

A $50 pledge will grant you a thank you letter from the team and a Bronze spot on our contributors list that will be given a shout out each week during This Week In Gaming! You will also be granted a special "Contributor" forum title on http://www.lugoentertainment.com as well as your name in the This Week In Gaming "By Gamers, For Gamers." intro! You will also get a This Week In Gaming T-Shirt signed by the three hosts!

A $75 pledge will grant you a thank you letter from the team and a Bronze spot on our contributors list that will be given a shout out each week during This Week In Gaming! You will also be granted a special "Contributor" forum title on http://www.lugoentertainment.com as well as your name in the This Week In Gaming "By Gamers, For Gamers." intro! You will also get a This Week In Gaming T-Shirt signed by the three hosts as well as a LUGO Entertainment T-Shirt!

A $100 pledge will grant you a thank you letter from the team and a Bronze spot on our contributors list that will be given a shout out each week during This Week In Gaming! You will also be granted a special "Contributor" forum title on http://www.lugoentertainment.com as well as your name in the This Week In Gaming "By Gamers, For Gamers." intro! You will also get a This Week In Gaming T-Shirt signed by the three hosts as well as a LUGO Entertainment T-Shirt signed by all our co-hosts and crew!

A $250 pledge will grant you a thank you letter from the team and a Bronze spot on our contributors list that will be given a shout out each week during This Week In Gaming! You will also be granted a special "Contributor" forum title on http://www.lugoentertainment.com as well as your name in the This Week In Gaming "By Gamers, For Gamers." intro! You will also get a This Week In Gaming T-Shirt signed by the three hosts as well as a LUGO Entertainment T-Shirt signed by all our co-hosts and crew! You will also get a "Producer" title with your name in the credits of the show!

A $500 pledge will grant you a thank you letter from the team and a Silver spot on our contributors list that will be given a shout out each week during This Week In Gaming! You will also be granted a special "Contributor" forum title on http://www.lugoentertainment.com as well as your name in the This Week In Gaming "By Gamers, For Gamers." intro! You will also get a LUGO swagger pack which will include a signed This Week In Gaming T-Shirt, signed LUGOEntertainment T-Shirt, Coffee Mug, Mouse Pad, and This Week In Gaming Sweatshirt! You will also get a "Producer" title with your name in the credits of the show!

A $1000 pledge will grant you a thank you letter from the team and a Silver spot on our contributors list that will be given a shout out each week during This Week In Gaming! You will also be granted a special "Contributor" forum title on http://www.lugoentertainment.com as well as your name in the This Week In Gaming "By Gamers, For Gamers." intro! You will also get a LUGO swagger pack which will include a signed This Week In Gaming T-Shirt, signed LUGOEntertainment T-Shirt, Coffee Mug, Mouse Pad, and This Week In Gaming Sweatshirt! You will also get a "Executive Producer" title with your name in the credits of the show! \r\nBut wait, there's more! If you pledge $1,000 we will even make you a personal thank you video that will be uploaded to http://www.youtube.com/LUGOEntertainment that will feature us saying thanks to you and giving your channel a shout out!

A $5000 pledge will grant you a thank you letter from the team and a Gold spot on our contributors list that will be given a shout out each week during This Week In Gaming! You will also be granted a special "Contributor" forum title on http://www.lugoentertainment.com as well as your name in the This Week In Gaming "By Gamers, For Gamers." intro! You will also get a "Executive Producer" title with your name in the credits of the show! \r\nBut wait, there's more! If you pledge $5,000 we will even make you a personal thank you video that will be uploaded to http://www.youtube.com/LUGOEntertainment that will feature us saying thanks to you and giving your channel a shout out! Also one of the hosts will personally fly out to your city for a day and hang out with you!

A $10,000 pledge will grant you a thank you letter from the team and a Diamond spot on our contributors list that will be given a shout out each week during This Week In Gaming! You will also be granted a special "MVP" forum title on http://www.lugoentertainment.com as well as your name in the This Week In Gaming "By Gamers, For Gamers." intro! You will also get a LUGO swagger pack which will include a signed This Week In Gaming T-Shirt, signed LUGOEntertainment T-Shirt, Coffee Mug, Mouse Pad, and This Week In Gaming Sweatshirt! You will also get a "Executive Producer" title with your name in the credits of the show! \r\nBut wait, there's more! If you pledge $10,000 we will even make you a personal thank you video that will be uploaded to http://www.youtube.com/LUGOEntertainment that will feature us saying thanks to you and giving your channel a shout out! Also we will fly you out to the next gaming convention for days of fun with one if not all of the hosts!
